words.source: H559 ʾamar, Qal wayyiqtol 1cs; KJV 'And I say', ESV 'and I say', NASB 'So I said'
H413 ʾel, preposition + 2ms suffix; KJV 'unto thee', ESV/NASB 'to you'
H7971 shalach, Piel imperative 2ms; KJV 'Let … go', ESV 'Let … go', NASB 'Let … go'
H853 ʾeth, direct object marker; not translated in KJV/ESV/NASB
H1121 ben, noun ms construct + 1cs suffix; KJV 'my son', ESV 'my son', NASB 'My son'
H5647 ʿabad, Qal weyiqtol 3ms + 1cs suffix; KJV 'that he may serve me', ESV 'that he may serve me', NASB 'that he may serve Me'
H3985 maʾen, Piel wayyiqtol 2ms; KJV 'and thou hast refused', ESV 'If you refuse', NASB 'but you have refused'
H7971 shalach, Piel infinitive construct + preposition le + 3ms suffix; KJV 'to let him go', ESV 'to let him go', NASB 'to let him go'
H2009 hinneh, interjection; KJV 'behold', ESV 'behold', NASB 'behold'
H595 ʾanokhi, independent pronoun 1cs; KJV 'I', ESV 'I', NASB 'I'
H2026 harag, Qal participle ms; KJV 'will slay', ESV 'will kill', NASB 'will kill'
H853 ʾeth, direct object marker; not translated in KJV/ESV/NASB
H1121 ben, noun ms construct + 2ms suffix; KJV 'thy son', ESV 'your … son', NASB 'your son'
H1060 bekor, noun ms + 2ms suffix; KJV 'thy … firstborn', ESV 'your firstborn', NASB 'your firstborn'
